title: Only4U Training Portal
shortDescription: A training & course portal with course listings, FAQ, testimonials and a modern learner experience.
longDescription: Only4U Training Portal is a responsive web frontend that organizes courses, FAQs, testimonials and a seamless student onboarding flow. The product focuses on discoverability of courses, easy enrollment, and an accessible UI for learners and admins.
clientReview: Great collaboration — delivered a clean UI, fast performance and an intuitive course experience. The team was responsive throughout the project.
details: Course listing page with search, filters and categories
FAQ and testimonials components integrated with CMS
Responsive, accessible UI with focus on performance
features: Course discovery with tags & category filters
Admin-friendly content structure for easy edits
problemStatement: Only4U needed a modern learner-facing frontend that made it easy for users to find courses, read testimonials and enroll. The existing UI was dated and not mobile-optimized.
solutionSummary: We delivered a responsive React frontend using TailwindCSS, optimized assets and modular components so the client can scale course content quickly. The UI is fast, accessible and easy to maintain.
impactSummary: Within the first month the client reported improved course enrollments (≈12% uplift) and positive feedback on ease-of-use. The frontend shipped with a clear pattern library for future growth.

title: HR Diagnostic Testing Platform
shortDescription: A web platform for HR teams to create diagnostic MCQ tests, collect responses and generate AI-powered reports.
longDescription: This platform enables HR teams to upload a question bank (Excel), create diagnostic assessments, let participants take tests and then generate AI-driven diagnostic reports that include tables, radar data and strategic recommendations.
clientReview: Robust platform with clear user flows and excellent AI-generated diagnostic reports. The radar visualizations added strong value to leadership insights.
details: Admin UI to upload Excel and manage the question bank
Participant MCQ test-taking UI with scoring
Result processing and structured payload to ChatGPT for report generation
Radar chart visualization and exportable reports (PDF/HTML)
features: Excel import for bulk questions & maturity scores
Admin question CRUD and area categorization
Participant links and secure result submission
ChatGPT integration for strategic report generation
problemStatement: HR teams lacked a consolidated tool to quickly diagnose organizational maturity across HR areas and get actionable recommendations. Manual reporting was slow and inconsistent.
solutionSummary: We built an end-to-end platform: question-bank ingestion, test-taking UI, scoring pipeline, and automated report generation using ChatGPT. Outputs include tabular summaries, score distributions and radar chart data for quick leadership insights.
impactSummary: The platform reduced report turnaround from days to minutes and enabled HR teams to run cohort analyses. Leadership used the radar visuals to prioritize interventions.
